channel.title: nap on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nap on Barefoot Rob

item.title: cafe kips
item.description: 12:01 Wednesday 19 December 2018 JST For over a year, I have had gaps in my schedule on Wednesdays between teaching at Solid Square in Kawasaki and teaching at JB in Kawsaki. Usually I bring my computer and work in a cafe, but today is the second time I have worked in an internet cafe, which features my own private space with a padded floor for sleeping, free wifi, free shower, free drinks, and free ice cream.

item.title: today
item.description: 21:12 Wednesday 14 March 2018 JST After my morning lesson I had a big gap during which I had a big nap because dang I was tired. I seem to have gotten over the jet lag (new vocabulary word for some students today). I was roused by a security guard when I tried to nap on a grassy field on 3F of Lazona (next to Eggs N Things (or something)).
